metadata.title: CVE-2016-7569 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in docker2aci before 0.13.0 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the embedded layer data in an image.

criterions.comment: golang-github-appc-docker2aci package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
